panels.title: HTTP Requests Error Rate last 30 min

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by(uri, method) (rate(tomcat_global_request_seconds_count{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", uri!="*.actuator*"}[1m])))
topk(5, sum by(uri, method) (rate(tomcat_global_request_max_seconds{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", uri!="*.actuator*"}[1m])))
